categories: Category:Imperial Army enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Mattiso Trodu was a human male who served as a medic and a sergeant in the Galactic Empire's 224th Imperial Armored Division during the Mimban campaign. During the war, he and Specialist Gillen Finders administered medical aid to Corporal Chakobi Sanwright after he received injuries from a concussive force.
